ygData.subject: RE: Sonorous Clounding
ygData.msgSnippet: Lol, troll shaman in innothule...two words...REGEN and TWINK Faras ran out of lguk and gave my troll 120pp and a FS hammer.  Then my troll bought full leather,
ygData.messageBody:
Lol, troll shaman in innothule...two words...REGEN and TWINK

Faras ran out of lguk and gave my troll 120pp and a FS hammer. Then my
troll bought full leather, a shield, and all his spells through level 9.

Innothule has at most 14-20 people on in usually on E'ci and most are just
passing through so the hunting grounds are chock full of beasties. You can
get XP in innothule all the way up to level 10 without ever having to leave
the zone.

Oops, does the fact that my bard gave my troll money qualify this as a bard
list post? I better shut up.

Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
> Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 10:22 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Sonorous Clounding
>
>
> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
> >it is refreshing to log a level 5 troll shaman into
> innothule and get 2
> >levels in two hours.
>
> *sigh* *small voice* Two levels in two hours?
> My baby bard went from level 5 to level 7 last night...
> But it took me from 10:30p to 4am... How did you do it
> so FAST?...
>
> Sarah Heacock sarah@...
> Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
> Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
> Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
> Faesong, level 7 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Solusek Ro (Qeynos Hills)
>
